title: BRIEF-Waste Connections Sees Estimated Q1 Revenue To Be Between $1.130 Bln And $1.135 Bln‍​
text: February 15, 2018 / 2:08 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Waste Connections Sees Estimated Q1 Revenue To Be Between $1.130 Bln And $1.135 Bln‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 15 (Reuters) - Waste Connections Inc: * WASTE CONNECTIONS - FOR Q1, NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO WASTE CONNECTIONS IS ESTIMATED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $126.2 MILLION - SEC FILING * FOR Q1 OF THE YEAR, ESTIMATE REVENUE TO BE BETWEEN $1.130 BILLION AND $1.135 BILLION‍​ * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $1.15 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: ( bit.ly/2Ewgbm1 ) Further company coverage:
